price: Àwọn Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra gbére ni wọn yóò wọ inú rẹ̀. Àwọn kerewú wúrà àti òkúta olówó iyebíye ni A óò máa fi ṣe ọ̀ṣọ́ fún wọn nínú rẹ̀. Àti pé aṣọ àláárì ni aṣọ wọn nínú rẹ̀.
arabic: جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ يَدۡخُلُونَهَا يُحَلَّوۡنَ فِيهَا مِنۡ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٖ وَلُؤۡلُؤٗاۖ وَلِبَاسُهُمۡ فِيهَا حَرِيرٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: jannātu ʿadnin yadkhulūnahā yuḥallawna fīhā min asāwira min dhahabin walu'lu-an walibāsuhum fīhā ḥarīrun
